column7: Bene Data, sinibwira yuko maze kugifata, ariko kimwe cyo nibagirwa ibiri inyuma, ngasingira ibiri imbere,
column8: Bene Data, sinibwira yuko maze kugifata, ariko kimwe cyo nibagirwa ibiri inyuma, ngasingira ibiri imbere,

column7: Ni cyo gituma mbabazwa ntya nyamara singira isoni, kuko nzi uwo nizeye uwo ari we, kandi nzi neza yuko abasha kurinda ikibitsanyo namubikije kugeza kuri urya munsi.
column8: Ni cyo gituma mbabazwa ntya nyamara singira isoni, kuko nzi uwo nizeye uwo ari we, kandi nzi neza yuko abasha kurinda ikibitsanyo namubikije kugeza kuri urya munsi.

column7: Icyo nzi neza rwose ntashidikanya, ni uko Iyatangiye umurimo mwiza muri mwe izawurangiza rwose, kugeza ku munsi wa Yesu Kristo,
column8: Icyo nzi neza rwose ntashidikanya, ni uko Iyatangiye umurimo mwiza muri mwe izawurangiza rwose, kugeza ku munsi wa Yesu Kristo,

column7: Ntimuzi yuko mu birori abasiganwa biruka bose, ariko ugororerwa akaba umwe? Namwe abe ari ko mwiruka kugira ngo mugororerwe. Umuntu wese urushanwa yirinda muri byose. Abandi bagenzereza batyo kugira ngo bahabwe ikamba ryangirika, naho twebwe tugenzereza dutyo kugira ngo duhabwe iritangirika.

Abandi bagenzereza batyo kugira ngo bahabwe ikamba ryangirika, naho twebwe tugenzereza dutyo kugira ngo duhabwe iritangirika.
